title: Pineapple tarte tatin with spiced ice cream, dried pineapple and a hot caramel sauce
description: Pick and choose elements of this dessert to prepare yourself if you don’t have time to make it all. Shop-bought puff pastry, caramel sauce and good-quality bought ice cream will save you time and effort.Equipment and preparation: you will need an ice cream machine and two small ovenproof blini pans.
ingredients: 1 baby pineapple, peeled and sliced 3mm thick
250g/9oz very cold butter, cut into small cubes
2 sprigs fresh mint, plus extra for garnish
